BlackBerry 10: BES, BIS, Push e-mail, 10+: POP3, IMAP, ActiveSync

Android: {{Yes|Available on any device that supports the hardware. Android Pay for NFC payments available in Play Store.}}[267]
iOS: {{Yes|8+: iPhone 6/6 Plus and later (iPhone 5 and later if used with Apple Watch)}}, via Apple Pay

Feature: Direct file transfer over Wi-Fi Direct
Tizen: {{No}}, was available on bada 2+,[277] but removed on Tizen

Windows 10 Mobile: 8+: Between Mac/iOS only. (Note: AirDrop utilizes Wi-Fi as well)}}
Sailfish OS: {{No}}, was available on bada,[281] but removed on Tizen
Ubuntu Touch: {{Yes}}[282] but limited to images, videos and contacts
